Sherlyn confiesa que tiene un problema de salud desde niña
Sherlyn confesó que tiene un problema de salud desde muy niña.
07 Nov 2019, 15:22 by Ana Morocho
La actriz Sherlyn sorprendió a sus seguidores luego que diera detalles sobre su vida intima. A través de una entrevista, la joven confesó que tiene un problema de salud desde muy niña.



"A veces me ven que tengo como este problema pero nunca les he platicado bien", indicó la actriz de 34 años en su canal de Youtube, Mi vida bonita.
La artista mexicana reveló que desde niña le dan ‘hemorragias muy fuertes en la nariz', que incluso la llevan al hospital.
"Pero muy, muy fuertes, o sea las únicas cosas por las que he estado en el hospital en mi vida ha sido por eso", indicó.
La actriz indicó que esto se debe a que su sangre no coagula bien. "Tengo un tema de baja de plaquetas", detalló.
Sherlyn aclaró que no se trata de una enfermedad ni que tenga una mala alimentación.



"Es como así nací. No lo adquirí, no es porque no coma bien porque todo el mundo me dice ‘es que no comes', [pero] sí como perfecto", señaló.

Sherlyn confesses that she has a health problem since she was a child
Sherlyn confessed that she has a health problem since she was a child.
07 Nov 2019, 15:22 by Ana Morocho
Actress Sherlyn surprised her followers after giving details about her intimate life. Through an interview, the young woman confessed that she has a health problem since she was a child.



"Sometimes they see me as having this problem but I have never talked to them well," said the 34-year-old actress on her YouTube channel, Mi vida bonita.
The Mexican artist revealed that as a child she is given ‘very heavy nosebleeds, 'which even take her to the hospital.
"But very, very strong, that is, the only things I have been in the hospital for in my life have been for that," he said.
The actress indicated that this is because her blood does not clot well. "I have a low platelet issue," he said.
Sherlyn clarified that it is not a disease or that it has a bad diet.



"That's how I was born. I didn't get it, it's not because I don't eat well because everybody tells me‘ it's that you don't eat ', [but] yes, it's perfect, "he said.
